Mr. LARSEN of Washington. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to congratulate  Linda McCarthy on her retirement from Mt. Baker Planned Parenthood and  thank her for her many decades of service and dedication to the people  of Northwest Washington.

Since 1977, Linda McCarthy has been an advocate for women's health…

Ms. SIMON. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to address the House and oppose  the defunding of Planned Parenthood clinics nationwide.

The Republicans' cruel budget bill, which all Democrats opposed,  included a provision to block Federal Planned Parenthood clinics from  receiving Medicaid…
